Type.BattleDialog: Light the lanterns and open the path.
It is as though a moat of boiling water surrounds this place… We will breach their defense at all cost.
Remember the essentials. Wield your sword with no hesitation.
The passengers of a boat join forces to rescue each other when it sinks. We ought to help each other in times of need. We shall meet them again.
One error among a thousand thoughts… It is my mistake.
Knives are broken, and arrows are spent… We’re losing our ground.
…I see a dark cloud casting over the skies. It seems as if it will rain soon.
A waning moon gleams over the rooftop… I am sorry.
With too many thoughts in one’s head, a mistake is destined to happen.
How foolish of you. Shrewdness can be poison in excess.
An old steed knows well where to go.
Whether there is boiling water or searing fire… We can’t afford to wait and see.
I suppose anyone’s death is fair game here.
If you sit like a foolish duck, you’ll lose the battle.
I believe we’ll make it with no trouble.
This’ll be like all the knife fights before.
I’ll let the Rusted Chains know of this.
We are with them in the same boat… It’s only right that we help them.
I feel more listless than usual today…
The fault is mine…
Shameful… To miss a chance like this…
In the end, the edge of this blade… claimed my life.
We put ourselves in a real pickle…
I ought to think for my own life first.
Your rough and fitful journey comes to an end here; I hope you might rest in peace.
Must’ve gotten exhausted after fighting for so long.
All that cautiousness made you too stiff to dodge a sword.
You should’ve fared better against slashing from this sword.
